query:
SELECT 
  'medicos' as tabela, 
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN fotoUrl IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as sem_foto,
  SUM(CASE WHEN fotoUrl IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as com_foto
FROM medicos
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'instituicoes' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN fotoUrl IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as sem_foto,
  SUM(CASE WHEN fotoUrl IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as com_foto
FROM instituicoes
